ResumeParserData.Experience: HR Specialist  Google, London, UK  June 2017 - Present  At Google, I was responsible for managing employee relations, conducting recruitment drives, and coordinating training programs. I provided guidance on HR policies and procedures, ensuring compliance with legal and organizational standards. My role involved developing and implementing HR strategies that supported business objectives and fostered a positive work environment. I also managed performance appraisals and worked closely with managers to address employee concerns and improve workplace satisfaction.  HR Coordinator  Amazon, London, UK  April 2014 - May 2017  In my role at Amazon, I coordinated various HR activities, including recruitment, onboarding, and employee engagement programs. I assisted in the development and implementation of HR policies and procedures, ensuring they were communicated effectively to all employees. My responsibilities included maintaining employee records, preparing reports on HR metrics, and supporting the HR team in various administrative tasks. I played a key role in enhancing the employee experience through well-organized and efficient HR practices.
